content: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/BreadCoinDev/BreadCoin-Core/main/src/qt/res/icons/breadcoin.pngBreadCoinUPDATE: BreadCoin is a new coin that I made because I like bread that really is it (my brother and i made it because of bread)This creation is for fun if it becomes real coin I will be surprised we just made it because we like bread.NOT AN ICOFAIR LAUNCH-Specifications-Project name: BreadCoinTicker: BREADPoW/PoSAlgorithm: Wish (bmw512)Total supply: 9,875,231PoW: .1 BREAD per blockPoS: .1 BREAD per blockBlockTime: 5 MinutesPort: 20375RPCPort: 20425addnode=173.230.156.35:20375addnode=172.105.121.51:20375Masternode Collateral: TBA TBA ~ Masternode Payments go live Block payment structure ~15% ~ masternodes10% ~ Â dev-ops75% ~ miners/stakers>>>RESOURCES<<<Airdrop - Come to our discord and get rained on by the BreadCoin tipbot!BreadCoin Release Available Now!Windows wallet:  Link: https://github.com/BreadCoinDev/BreadCoin-Core/releases/tag/v1.0.0.0-stableTest pool now active: pool.uunigate.comWallet Preview:https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/981420703230361617/981766670781661254/Screenshot_2022-06-01_204715.pngBlock Explorer for BreadCoin is Coming Soon!Official GPU miner provided by Pallas!https://github.com/saltinechips/ccminer-bmw512 Compiled by Toxic Link: https://github.com/saltinechips/rbx Just add -m 256 to the end of your ccminer config

comments.author: GeePeeU
comments.body: 10% to devs ? The the devs being you and your brother ?Also, you have a WIX website, no pools, no explorer, and 5 minute block times. If this coin does get off the ground, I see you and your brother rug pulling as soon as you see any actual value. Anyone would be foolish to use their resources on this project. It's cool that you are young, and are exploring blockchain tech. But pumping out shitcoins is a shameful path to start on.
